feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [WAW][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 3, 02:00 UTC  -  Oct 5, 05:00 UTC

Sep 22, 21:39 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/10/2023 02:00 UTC
End time : 05/10/2023 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage Wave 5 - 6
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 2, 07:00 UTC  -  Oct 11, 19:00 UTC

Sep 26, 23:51 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/10/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 11/10/2023 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Some latency during the operations.
Service improvement : In order to improve our services, we need to free up all the admin or client zpools located on the LV1 and LV2 filers.

entry.title: [RBX][VMware Private Cloud] - Storage tete-516
entry.content:
Sep 25, 03:45 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/09/2023 00:30 UTC
End Time : 25/09/2023 03:02 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to an hardware issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 25, 01:55 UTC
Identified - Start time: 25/09/2023 00:30 UTC
User impact : Datastore pcc-002570 was unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX
Root cause : Incident due to an hardware issue.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] â€“ NSX , vCenter, Zerto & ESXi major upgrade
entry.content:
Sep 22, 17:18 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 2, 14:27 UTC
Update - The maintenance has a new end time :
New end time : 31/08/2023 16:00 UTC

Jun 12, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 9, 17:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/06/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 31/08/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During NSX upgrade , Hosts will be put in maintenance mode and reboot
During vSphere and Zerto migrations , management will be inaccessible for 3 hours.
During ESXi migrations , In some case Binaries will be pushed locally or Hosts will be rebooted, (no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service

Scheduled - Start time : 18/09/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 22/09/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management will be unavailable during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services.
An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.
